response.job_title: Chemical Engineer | Design Thinking | Scrum Master | Pharma-Tech
response.summary:
Chemical engineer highly oriented towards understanding the phenomena that take place in a production process and to analyze information to propose continuous improvements efficiently and responsibly.Skillful in designing processes for product development. Working in a multidisciplinary team gives me the focus for innovative ideas, challenging leaders and fully solve situations of improvement.

I have experience in the analysis of productive processes , R&D technology transfer in pharmaceutical sector taking into account Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP), procedures and business rules. I have knowledge in GMP, process validation, sensorial analysis, food engineering, non-parametric statistics, environmental impact studies, water quality, computer tools, among others.
response.skills: Design Thinking, Scrum Master, Transferencia tecnológica, Validación de procesos, Research and Development (R&D), Process Engineering, Environmental Impact Assessment, Water Quality, Project Management, Statistical Data Analysis, Product Innovation, Process Simulation, Pharmaceutical Industry, Continuous Improvement, Industria farmacéutica, Desarrollo de productos, HACCP, Visio, Microsoft Office, Chemical Process Engineering

profile_positions.description:
•Provide support to the production team as the primary point of contact.
•Provide technical information for process-related matters within the transfer team.
•Identify and implement continuous improvement projects.
•Assist with investigations related to product and process.
•Test new materials of packaging, revise existing materials, and update bills of materials.
profile_positions.title: Technology Transfer Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Transfers development processes to the plant of human and veterinary pharmaceutical products (solids, liquids and non-sterile suspensions, sterile solutions and suspensions: ophthalmic and injectable)
• Develops projects related to the design, formulation, reformulation and manufacturing of new products.
• Advices to clients in manufacturing processes.
• Training of personnel in technological transfer with the objective of fulfilling parameters of product quality in the plant.
• Standardization of productive processes.
• Creations of technological transfer protocols for production processes.
• Prospectives validation of productive processes, analysis of process capacity, personnel qualification, documentary support, statistic analysis.
• Monitoring and plant support of new products in the different production lines.
profile_positions.title: Technology Transfer Project Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Manage and supervise the dispensing, manufacturing, packaging and conditioning personnel to achieve the defined performance objectives.
• Coordinate and supervise the production processes guaranteeing the production program.
• Lead and plan production plans.
• Manage purchases of raw materials, packaging material and packaging.
• Review record batch and equipment operating parameters for resource optimization and compliance with good cosmetic manufacturing practices (BPMC).
• Train personnel in BPMC, production, product quality to ensure compliance with safety and safety regulatory requirements.
• Create production orders and cost analysis with the TNS program.
• Lead the inventory control of the warehouses of raw materials, product in process, packaging and packaging material, finished product.
• Ensure that the production process, in its different stages, complies with the quality management system.
• Creation and monitoring of area indicators.
• Support to the R&D area in scaling and control of physicochemical parameters of new products.
• Support to the R&D area in the formulation of new products.
• Accompaniment on INVIMA audits.
profile_positions.title: Production Manager

profile_positions.description:
Functions: Analysis of the production processes in order to design the plan HACCP in the production area. Creating and updating standard operating procedures. Creating of product description sheets. Creating process flow charts. Documentary management.

Achievements:
- Designed the HACCP plan for the production area with the aim of standardizing production processes and controlling them.
- Analyzed production area information to update and create standard operating procedures.
- Trained the staff of the company in Good Manufacturing Practices (GPM).
- Analyzed the microbiological history of the production area to establish statistical control limits in the production area.
profile_positions.title: Chemical Engineering Intern (Manufacturing Process & Quality Management)

profile_positions.description:
Functions: Software update and attention to students in the room of simulation of chemical and biochemical processes.

Achievements:
-Attended and solved questions from the students about the course of chemical process simulation with the handling of the tool Aspen Plus and Aspen Hysys.
-Coordinated the entrance and use of the simulation room.
profile_positions.title: Student Assistant

education.degree_name: Especialización en Evaluación y Desarrollo de Proyectos

education.field_of_study: Metodologías ágiles e innovación en la organización
Validation of pharmaceutical processes with emphasis on statistical data management

company.name: Eurofarma
company.description:
Since its establishment in 1972, Eurofarma has been operating in the health industry, producing and marketing products and services to improve people's quality of life. Focused on generating shared value, it operates in the areas of Prescription, Nos-Prescription, Generics, Hospital and Oncology. It offers over 700 products, over 2,000 SKUs and serves 42 medical specialties. In Brazil, it covers 100 therapeutic classes, which represent 70% of prescriptions in the entire market.

Operating in 20 countries, with manufacturing facilities in Brazil and industrial parks in six other Latin American countries, it generated net sales of R$ 7.1 billion in 2021, a growth of 23% compared to the previous year, and employs more than 8,100 people.
